long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Summarize is a revolutionary Chrome browser extension designed to help users quickly understand and digest web content. Using advanced artificial intelligence technology, this plugin automatically analyzes all text content on the current page and generates 3-5 key point summaries. Whether you're a student, researcher, professional, or casual internet user, Summarize can significantly improve your reading efficiency and save valuable time.

Key Features:

1. Intelligent Summarization:
   - Automatically analyzes all content on the current webpage
   - Generates 3-5 concise and clear key points
   - Helps users quickly grasp the core content of articles

2. Highly Customizable:
   - Supports custom AI API addresses and tokens
   - Allows users to configure personalized prompts
   - Flexibly adapts to specific needs of different users

3. Multi-language Support:
   - Supports 12 major languages:
     English (en), Simplified Chinese (zh-CN), Traditional Chinese (zh-TW),
     French (fr), German (de), Italian (it), Japanese (ja),
     Spanish (es), Russian (ru), Korean (ko),
     Portuguese (pt), and Arabic (ar)
   - Easily handles multilingual web content

4. Secure and Reliable:
   - Uses token authentication instead of user cookies
   - Ensures user privacy and data security

5. Cross-browser Compatibility:
   - Easy to migrate and use in different browser environments

Advanced Features:

1. Custom AI API:
   - Supports integration with various compatible AI services, such as OpenAI, Claude, Deepseek Qwen, and more
   - Enter API address and corresponding access token in the settings page
   - Adjust usage strategy based on different AI service characteristics

2. Personalized Prompts:
   - Users can customize prompts based on their needs
   - For example: "Please summarize the main points of this article in academic language"
   - Or: "Please explain the content of the article in simple, easy-to-understand terms"

3. Token Management:
   - Uses tokens instead of cookies for authentication
   - Facilitates synchronization of preferences across different devices and browsers
   - Enhances account security and reduces privacy leak risks

4. Multilingual Optimization:
   - Intelligently identifies the main language of the webpage
   - Automatically selects the most appropriate language for summary generation
   - Supports summary translation between 12 languages
